name: hooded
title: Hooded Printed Quilted Coat
description: Pack. Pack. Pack it up! This nylon jacket with reflective trim can literally be packed into itself in seconds. Features a waterproof nylon fabric, Android eyes &amp; antennaes on the hood and a  carrying strap when jacket is fully packed. Android robot is printed on back above zipper in a reflective, metallic finish.

name: double
title: Double Breasted Fit and Flare Coat
description: Stay warm in this cozy hoodie made of 50% cotton and 50% polyester. This comfortable design features set in sleeves, dyed to match draw cord and a front pouch pocket. Available in Charcoal with the full color YouTube logo screen printed across the chest. Unisex sizing.

name: striped
title: Striped Zipper Design Bomber Jacket
description: Cozy up with this full-zip hoodie.&nbsp;<div><br></div><div>Features:</div><div><ul><li>60% combed, ring-spun cotton, 40% polyester.</li><li>Unisex sizing.</li><li>Retail fit.</li><li>Contrast zipper.</li><li>Kangaroo pockets with ribbed cuffs and waistband.</li><li>Available in dark heather with the white Google logo embroidered at left chest.</li></ul></div><div><br></div>
